frontmatter.title: Design
frontmatter.description: Design principles serve as guiding notions that shape the design of the Shopify admin, with Polaris providing support in implementing these principles effectively.

posts.description: Efficiency, intuition, and style combined to empower merchants with data-rich views, action-driven interfaces, and dynamic interactions.
posts.title: Pro design language

posts.description: Color highlights important areas, communicates status, urgency, and directs attention.
posts.title: Color

posts.description: Depth introduces a sense of realism, helps establish visual hierarchy, and creates focus.
posts.title: Depth

posts.description: Icons enhance an experience by providing intuitive and efficient navigation, conveying information concisely, and making it more visually appealing.
posts.title: Icons

posts.description: Layout determines the placement, positioning, and organization of various components within the UI, such as buttons, menus, content sections, and other visual elements.
posts.title: Layout

posts.description: Motion brings dynamism to an interface, offers visual feedback, and aids merchants understanding the outcomes of their actions.
posts.title: Motion

posts.description: Typography is the art of arranging type in ways that provides innate hierarchy to UI.
posts.title: Typography

posts.description: Visualizations surface patterns in data, and provide immediate answers to a single, specific question.
posts.title: Data visualizations

posts.description: The Shopify admin uses a precise illustration style to help merchants quickly and clearly understand how things work across every experience.
posts.title: Illustrations

posts.description: Interaction states communicate the status of an element in the interface, establish confidence once an action is taken, and suggest the ability (or inability) to interact with the element.
posts.title: Interaction states

posts.description: We use sound to communicate information and to enhance how merchants experience the Shopify admin. Sound patterns make interactions easier and more predictable.
posts.title: Sounds
